mapper.insert: INSERT INTO like_list VALUES('like' || like_seq.nextval, #{originId}, sysdate, #{mId})
INSERT INTO meet_parti(meetp_id, m_id, meet_id, my_fund) VALUES('meetp' || meetp_seq.nextval, #{mId}, #{meetId}, #{myFund})
INSERT INTO wallet_history VALUES ('wallet' || wallet_seq.nextval, #{mId}, #{walletMoney}, #{walletType}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT u.meet_title, p.m_id, u.meet_id, u.total_day, p.success, p.achiv, u.meet_pic, p.today_flag FROM meet_un u JOIN meet_parti p ON (u.meet_id = p.meet_id) WHERE p.m_id=#{mId}
mapper.update: UPDATE meet_parti SET achiv=#{achiv}, success = success + 1, today_flag = 'true' WHERE meetp_id = #{meetpId}
mapper.select: SELECT meet_id FROM meet_un WHERE sysdate BETWEEN meet_start and meet_end
mapper.update: UPDATE meet_parti SET fail = fail + 1 WHERE meetp_id=#{meetpId}
UPDATE meet_parti SET today_flag = 'false' WHERE meetp_id=#{meetpId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM meet_un WHERE meet_end = TRUNC(sysdate, 'dd') - 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO meet_un(meet_id, meet_title, meet_start, meet_end, meet_content, m_id, meet_pic, min_money) VALUES('meet' || meet_seq.nextval, #{meetTitle}, #{meetStart}, #{meetEnd}, #{meetContent}, #{mId}, #{meetPic}, #{minMoney})
